summary: An ordinance providing for the rebating and refunding of the excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of East Jefferson Street, et al, under Ordinance No. 14982 creating Local Improvement District No. 1336, to the payors thereof, directing the city treasurer to prepare a detailed list of said payors of assessment and authorizing the drawing of a warrants and appropriating money out of said Local Improvement District Fund for said purpose.
